To Whom It may Concern:  
1-                 DanceAge.com 
2-                 TakTaz.com 
3-                 NikTaz.com 
4-                 ParsNava.com 
5-                 MusicTnt.com 
Are placing and offering our musical copyrighted materials with no
authorization from us. Therefore, we request their immediate removal. 
An electronic signature of the copyright owner, or a person authorized
to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive copyright that has
allegedly been infringed. We hereby certify under we are the legal
owners of infringed musical compositions. If you require to have all
signed statement, please provide us your fax number, we will fax it to
you.  
Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed,
or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by
a single notification, a representative list of such works on that site.
1- DanceAge.com, 2- TakTaz.com, 3- NikTaz.com, 4- ParsNava.com, 5-
